titleStmt.title: The fast friend: or A friend at mid-night. Set forth in an exposition on that parable Luke 11. 5.-11. Which of you shall have a friend, and shall go unto him at mid-night, &c. By Nehemiah Rogers, minister of the Gospel.
titleStmt.author: Rogers, Nehemiah, 1593-1660.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for Geo. Sawbridge, at the Bible, on Ludgate-Hill,

notesStmt.note: Running title reads: A friend at mid-night.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
